frontmatter.title: Structured Outputs
frontmatter.module: Module 2 — Getting More from Your Prompts

labPresets.initialPrompt:
Extract the following information and return it in JSON format: Name, Age, and Occupation.
Text: Sarah, a 29-year-old data scientist, works at a startup.

examples: Provide a bulleted list of three challenges in project management.
Output the following movie details as JSON: Title, Director, Year.

quiz.q: True or False: Structured output prompting helps ensure consistent response formatting.
Which of the following is an example of a structured output format?
choices: A JSON object with keys and values
quiz.answer: A JSON object with keys and values
